Name: Curse Master
Description: Cultists; The curse master stands amidst his pentagram which he uses to curse his enemies. He wears dark robes and his face is cloaked in shadows while blood runs down his robes onto the floor.

Name: Drencher
Description: Parasites; A fly-like creature that spews green, slimy liquid on anything close to it. Every flap of its wings slings droplets in its vicinity.

Name: Party Queen
Description: Junkies; The Party Queen always has the best potions and powders going for her. Every color can be seen on her brown cloak, even those you didn't know ever existed.

Name: Intimidator
Description: Invaders; Looking like he is on steroids and mostly without a shirt, the Intimidator is there to keep idiots in check. Whether that is through his presence or a show of force depends on the idiots that try to disturb the invasion.

Name: Embargo Tender
Description: Merchants; A shrewd businessman in fancy clothing that takes coin in exchange for keeping others out from the city. The highest bidder always wins. He is dressed in fine robes and always has paper and a quill at the ready.

Name: Buff Mage
Description: Mages; A mage specialized in buffing its allies with their spells. The robes are heavy and of silver color, almost resembling a chain armor.

Name: Celestial Messenger
Description: Clerics; An angelic figure with white wings and pale blueish skin that brings the message of the gods from above. It brings scrolls as well as spoken messages.

Name: Fence
Description: Thieves; Lurking at the corner of alleyways and in the underground of the city, the Fence takes any goods and produces valid counteroffers, for a price. But don't let the slender figure fool you, as daggers await you under their brown cloak.

Name: Amplifier
Description: Aberrations; A large fleshy mass of multicolored tumors that magically enhances its allies.

Name: Planner
Description: Assassins; Mostly sitting in his small, dark room, the Planner enjoys the candle light that brightens the building plans of noble houses, palaces and other local establishments. His clothing is unusually normal.

Name: Chimera
Description: Monsters; A stitched together monster with different animal parts. It has multiple heads, which may be that of a monkey, a snake, a lion, a wolf or a spider.

Name: Hunter
Description: Farmers; Equipped with a heavy crossbow, leather armor and multiple traps, the Hunter keeps dangerous animals away from the farms, but also uninvited visitors.
